1. City Commission

City Commission
===============

* Last Wednesday of each month
* City Hall
  201 S Highway 287
  Cactus, TX 79103

Agendas, minutes, and legal notices are available for online viewing. Agendas will be posted 72 hours before the scheduled City of Cactus commission meetings, which are located at city hall. Minutes will be posted once approved by the city commission.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://cityofcactus.org/AgendaCenter/)

1. #### Socorro Marquez

   Mayor

   [Email Socorro Marquez](mailto:smarquez@cityofcactus.org)

1. #### Raul Ceniceros

   Commissioner

   [Email Raul Ceniceros](mailto:rceniceros@cityofcactus.org)



1. #### Adan Estrada

   Commissioner

   [Email Adan Estrada](mailto:adan.estrada@cityofcactus.org)

The City of Cactus Commission is a small governing board held by our elected officials. Our city commission consists of five members, elected at large. To reach cactus commissioners, contact individuals by email or call 806-655-5000, ext. 223.

### [Contact Us](https://cityofcactus.org/Directory.aspx)
